BIO

Hi! I'm Grace Olumuyiwa, a Mathematician, self-taught Web Developer and Scholar

My curiosity in how lucrative the internet world can be to me in the year 2020 has brought and persuaded me into this great field I am now, Web Development.

My consistency makes coding more experimental and challenging, but my unrelenting spirit makes it more interesting.

Gaining skills every day. Seeking where I can apply my skills and upskill.
